神習教: (しんしゅうきょう) - Shinshu-kyo (sect of Shinto)
神聖ローマ帝国: (しんせいローマていこく) - Holy Roman Empire
神聖戦争: (しんせいせんそう) - Sacred War
神聖視: (しんせいし) - regarding something as sacred; apotheosis; deification
神職: (しんしょく) - Shinto priest; Shinto priesthood
神興: (みこし) - (esp. 神輿)  portable shrine (carried in festivals); (みこし only)  (esp. 御輿)  palanquin; (みこし only)  (esp. sitting down, getting up, etc.)  buttocks/lower back/waist/hips
神色自若: (しんしょくじじゃく) - (yoji) perfect composure; calm and collected
神薙ぎ: (かんなぎ) - (巫 is esp. female and 覡 male) medium; diviner; shaman; oracle
神謡集: (しんようしゅう) - collection of mythology
神足通: (じんそくつう) - unimpeded bodily function (one of the six supernormal Buddhist powers)
神輿: (じんよ) - (esp. 神輿)  portable shrine (carried in festivals); (みこし only)  (esp. 御輿)  palanquin; (みこし only)  (esp. sitting down, getting up, etc.)  buttocks/lower back/waist/hips
神農: (しんのう) - Shennong; mythical king of ancient China
神迎え: (かみむかえ) - rite welcoming back the gods from Izumo Shrine (on the last day of the tenth lunar month)
神送り: (かみおくり) - rite seeing off the gods on their way to Izumo Shrine (held on the last night of the ninth lunar month and first night of the tenth lunar month); exorcism
神通力: (じんづうりき) - supernatural power; divine power; magical power
神速: (しんそく) - great speed; extreme speed; swiftness
神遊: (かみあそび) - song and dance performed as an offering to the gods
神遊び: (かみあそび) - song and dance performed as an offering to the gods
神道五部書: (しんとうごぶしょ) - five fundamental texts of Ise Shinto
神道信者: (しんとうしんじゃ) - followers of Shintoism
神道修成派: (しんとうしゅうせいは) - Shinto Shusei-ha (sect of Shinto)
神道十三派: (しんとうじゅうさんぱ) - the thirteen sects of Sect Shinto (Fuso-kyo, Taisha-kyo, Jikko-kyo, Konko-kyo, Kurozumi-kyo, Misogi-kyo, Ontake-kyo, Shinri-kyo, Shinshu-kyo, Shinto Shusei-ha, Shinto Taikyo, Taisei-kyo, Tenri-kyo)
神道大成教: (しんとうたいせいきょう) - Shinto Taiseikyo (sect of Shinto)
神道大教: (しんとうたいきょう) - Shinto Taikyo (sect of Shinto)
神道尖鼠: (シントウトガリネズミ) - shinto shrew (Sorex shinto)
神酒: (みわ) - sacred wine or sake; sake offered to the gods
神采: (しんさい) - surpassing looks/exceptional appearance; mind and appearance
神鉄: (しんてつ) - Kobe Dentetsu (Kobe area railway system)
神鏡: (しんきょう) - divine mirror; sacred mirror (one of the three sacred treasures)
神降ろし: (かみおろし) - invoking a deity during a festival held in that deity's honor; medium's invocation of a deity to take possession of her (to receive his divine message or revelation)
神階: (しんかい) - relative rank accorded the gods of Shintoism
神隠し: (かみがくし) - mysterious disappearance; being spirited away
神韻縹渺: (しんいんひょうびょう) - (yoji) (a work of art being) sublime; transcendent
神頼み: (かみだのみ) - entreaty to a deity
神風: (かむかぜ) - divine wind (esp. a typhoon thought to have protected Japan from a Mongolian invasion in the 13th century); (かみかぜ only) kamikaze
神風タクシー: (かみかぜタクシー) - kamikaze taxi (1960s term for taxis that fail to heed traffic regulations)
神饌: (しんせん) - food and alcohol offering to the gods
神馬藻: (ホンダワラ) - Sargassum fulvellum (species of edible brown alga)
神髄: (しんずい) - essence; quintessence; spirit; soul; heart; pith; pith and marrow
神鬼: (しんき) - gods and demons/divine spirits and souls of the dead; one with (spiritual) power beyond that of humans; fierce god
神鹿: (しんろく) - deer raised upon the grounds of a shrine (who serve as messengers of the gods)
祟り: (たたり) - curse; divine punishment; wrath (of an angry spirit)
祟る: (たたる) - to curse/to cast a spell/to haunt/to torment; to cause a bad result/to bring about a negative outcome
祠堂: (しどう) - lay ancestral hall/hall on temple grounds for holding mortuary tablets of lay parishioners; small shrine
祢宜: (ねぎ) - {Shinto}  senior priest (of a Shinto shrine, below chief priest and deputy chief priest); grasshopper/locust
祥月: (しょうつき) - month of a person's death
祥月命日: (しょうつきめいにち) - (yoji) anniversary of a person's death
票: (hyou) - cédula, voto, cédula; rótulo, bilhete, etiqueta, talão
票差: (ひょうさ) - margin (e.g. in a vote)
祭: (sai/matsu) - festival , festival, feast; harassment by an Internet pitchfork mob, online shaming, flaming
祭り上げる: (まつりあげる) - to set up (in high position); to kick upstairs
祭り寿司: (まつりずし) - popular type of sushi bento, differing by regions; brand of sushi bento
祭り込む: (まつりこむ) - to place an obnoxious person in an out-of-the-way post to be rid of him or her
祭り鮓: (まつりずし) - popular type of sushi bento, differing by regions; brand of sushi bento
祭る: (まつる) - to deify/to enshrine; to pray/to worship
祭上げる: (まつりあげる) - to set up (in high position); to kick upstairs
祭主: (さいしゅ) - (head) priest; head priest of the Ise Shrine
祭官: (さいかん) - official who arranges festival and rites
